nodes.text: Squad Three was a squad of stormtroopers assigned to Imperial captain Drezzel. Following the Battle of Endor and the death of the Emperor, the squad was stationed on the planet Seoul 5. When Drezzel was informed that a non-Imperial ship, the Millennium Falcon, had landed on Seoul 5, he sent out Squad Three to investigate. The squad and its members were destroyed when Han Solo caused a Seoularian crystal accident to destroy Seoul 5 city in a massive cataclysm.
